entry.def: If you refer to a dysfunction in something such as a relationship or someone's behaviour, you mean that it is different from what is considered to be normal.

example.ex: ...his severe emotional dysfunction was very clearly apparent.
example.tran: 显而易见他情绪严重异常。

entry.def: If someone has a physical dysfunction, part of their body is not working properly.
